description: SOLx402 MCP Server is a Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that enables AI assistants to interact with the x402 payment protocol on Solana. It provides tools for discovering and consuming x402-enabled services, managing USDC payments, querying protocol documentation, and accessing Solana development resources through integrated MCP clients.

maxPrice.description: Maximum price to pay for services in USDC. e.g 10000 = 0.01 USDC

isMainnet.description: Set to true for mainnet, false for devnet

useSolanaMcpServer.description: Set to true to use Solana MCP Server. Default false

capabilities.name: x402_protocol_flow
capabilities.description: Visual diagram showing the x402 protocol flow and architecture

capabilities.name: search_x402_documentation
capabilities.description: Search across the documentation to find relevant information, code examples, API references, and guides. Use this tool when you need to answer questions about x402, find specific documentation, understand how features work, or locate implementation details. The search returns contextual content with titles and direct links to the documentation pages.

capabilities.name: get_x402_services
capabilities.description: Retrieve a list of available X402 services from the facilitator.

capabilities.name: get_wallet_public_key
capabilities.description: Retrieve the public key of the configured wallet.

capabilities.name: get_wallet_usdc_balance
capabilities.description: Retrieve the USDC balance of the configured wallet.

capabilities.name: get_facilitators
capabilities.description: Retrieve a list of known Solana facilitators.
